title: League of Legends opening twice
body: I don't now why , but when i enter in a game  i have only 1 laucher opened then after the match starts my lol is opening two times and i get low fps , how i can fix that ?

replies.body: So you have two clients open and the game window as well? Can you perhaps try testing this again in a custom match and [**grab a screenshot**](https://gyazo.com/) of what you're seeing?

> [{quoted}](name=Xesoarece,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=GrnLi9qQ,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-02-28T15:36:28.105+0000)
>
> I don&#039;t now why , but when i enter in a game  i have only 1 laucher opened then after the match starts my lol is opening two times and i get low fps , how i can fix that ?

I am playing on old launcher
